messages.msgSnippet: Thanks, Tori.  I still do get criticism sometimes for preferring marriage to divorce.
messages.messageBody: Thanks, Tori. I still do get criticism sometimes for preferring marriage to divorce.

messages.subject: Re: Caring for Marriage (Worldwide Marriage Encounter = Retrouvaille, b
messages.msgSnippet: One of the most important things I learned from reading here is how much I need to nurture my relationship with my husband--that the principles of unschooling
messages.messageBody:
One of the most important things I learned from reading here is how much I
need to nurture my relationship with my husband--that the principles of
unschooling are necessary for US, not just for our children. It sounds
silly to say it now, because it seems like common sense, something I
should've just known. Thank you for that, Sandra. My whole family is
happier and learning so much more because of what you've taken the time and
effort to share here.

Tori
mama to Tolinka & Obi, Ray's best friend and wife


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
